text: The Wiz is a 1978 American fantasy musical adventure movie directed by Sidney Lumet and was based on the 1974 musical of the same name by William F. Brown. It stars Michael Jackson, Diana Ross, Richard Pryor, Ted Ross, Nipsey Russell, Lena Horne and was distributed by Universal Pictures. It was nominated for 4 Academy Awards in 1979. ==Other websites== * * * * * Category:1978 adventure movies Category:1970s fantasy movies Category:1978 musical movies Category:American adventure movies Category:American fantasy movies Category:American musical movies Category:Movies based on musicals Category:Blaxploitation movies Category:Movies directed by Sidney Lumet Category:Universal Pictures movies Category:Movies about wizards Category:Movies set in New York City Category:Movies set in the 1970s
title: The Wiz (movie)
